select du.*, c.vehicle_no, c.id as car_id, dcbr.binding_state from driver_user as du left join driver_car_binding_relationship as dcbr on du.id = dcbr.driver_id left join car as c on dcbr.car_id = c.id where 1=1
and du.driver_phone like concat('%',#{para.driverPhone},'%')
and du.driver_name like concat('%',#{para.driverName},'%')
